```{r}
load("~/rnaGinesis/data/datasetGSE19830.RData")
tab = parsedGSE19830
tab$sampleInfo@data$characteristics_ch1
tab$sampleInfo@data
# head(tab$expression)
# tab$sampleInfo@data$source_name_ch1
# tab$expression[,1:3]

x <- row.names(tab$expression)
liver <- vector()
for(i in 1:31099) {
  liver <- c(liver, mean(tab$expression[i,1:3]))
}

brain <- vector()
for(i in 1:31099) {
  brain <- c(brain, mean(tab$expression[i,4:6]))
}

lung <- vector()
for(i in 1:31099) {
  lung <- c(lung, mean(tab$expression[i,7:9]))
}

vec <- cbind(liver, brain, lung)
row.names(vec) <- x
exp3 <- list()
exp3$ex <- as.matrix(parsedGSE19830$expression)
exp3$unmixed <- as.data.frame(vec)
# vec
# vec <- as.matrix(vec[which(vec != NULL),])
# exp3 <- as.data.frame(as.matrix(vec[which(vec != 0),]))
print(exp3)
save(exp3, file = "~/rnaGinesis/data/exp3.RData")
```
